Suhana Khan Was Made Daddy SRK’s Assistant Director For 'Zero' So That He Comes On Time
Suhana Khan Was Made Daddy SRK’s Assistant Director For 'Zero' So That He Comes On Time
Now we all know Shah Rukh Khan’s daughter Suhana khan is extremely interested in making her career in Bollywood.
Twitter
In fact, she has been prepping for the same. We also saw Suhana accompanying dad SRK on the sets of Zero.
Twitter
In an interaction with the media, the superstar was asked about his daughter being on sets, to which he said,

“ She wants to act like I have said before but she needs to train for 3 to 4 years. She is doing some plays and theatre in London and now hopefully she will shift to America, she came on sets to learn how production works, as it is an important pat for an actor to learn. She was home so I told her to come along. I wanted her to see Anushka and Katrina’s acting because both of them are different kind of actors, Katrina has her own charm while Anushka has her way of enacting things, so I wanted her to spend time with them, but instead they put her as my assistant director to get me from home on time. She was like papa the shot is ready.”
Twitter
He later added, “I think ground experience is good for any actor. I want her to study acting for 3 to 4 years. In India, we don't learn acting we just assume we know acting. I want her to learn acting thoroughly”.
Undoubtedly, Suhana is the luckiest daughter. Agree?
